index.title: Bookmarkify.js: Launch your code with a single click
index.description: Create .js a bookmark that will execute any javascript you want by just clicking it.
index.intro1: Stop typing agan and again same javascript code in your console; write it once and reuse it as many times as you want.
index.intro2: Create .js a bookmark that will execute any javascript you want by just clicking it.
index.failed: Seems the script you provided is not valid. Give it another shot.
